meanings.definition: Microfilarias: plural noun, small larvae of parasitic worms found in the blood of infected individuals.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the blood sample under the microscope and discovered microfilarias.
meanings.sent2: In tropical regions, mosquitoes can transmit microfilarias to humans through their bites.
meanings.sent3: The microfilarias in the blood were having a party, but the immune system gatecrashed it!
meanings.sent4: The presence of microfilarias in the bloodstream was like hidden spies gathering information.
meanings.sent5: The tiny microfilarias swam through the blood vessels like miniature submarines on a secret mission.
